alert.note: Alert for Langlade; Marathon; Menominee; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 2:44PM CDT until May 12 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Marathon County in central Wisconsin... Northwestern Menominee County in northeastern Wisconsin... South central Langlade County in north central Wisconsin... Western Shawano County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 244 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Antigo, Wittenberg, Neopit, Polar, Norrie, Neva, Birnamwood, Hatley, Mattoon and Bowler. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
